title: Gab and Juls: Time to panic for Barcelona?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens reflect on Barcelona’s 3-0 defeat to Bayern Munich and their subsequent exit from the Champions League. The guys also discuss plenty of VAR controversy in the Champions League, Erling Haaland’s return Dortmund, and a possible move back to boyhood club, Sporting, for Cristiano Ronaldo.

itunes:subtitle: Barcelona and Juventus' failures, VAR controversies, Ronaldo's next move
